text: ‫ؠ‬ Yes, I know what it is ‫ؠ‬ I have heard of it but I am not sure what it is ‫ؠ‬ No, I have never heard of it A pandemic is a worldwide epidemic caused by a virus that is as yet unknown and for which no vaccine is available. An example is the Asian bird flu. When that virus infects people, a new and unknown form of influenza that is transmitted from person to person develops. It is not possible to predict whether or not a new influenza virus is in fact dangerous and will cause an epidemic or a pandemic.
